description.p: Hugin Calibrate Lens is a tool for lens calibration using the straight line method.

ul.li: Load images ("add" opens a file browser)
Check focal length and crop factor (calibrate lens tries to read them from the EXIF data)
Select "Find lines" to detect the straight lines
Choose the lens parameters to optimise, then select "Optimize"
"Save lens" to save optimised lens parameters into file for use in hugin

description.p: Calibrate_lens_gui is installed when you install hugin.
